roadmap.heading: Token Development and Smart Contract Launch
roadmap.desc: In this initial phase, GenOS AI focuses on developing and deploying the $GENOS token on the Ethereum network (ERC-20),ensuring security through comprehensive audits. The phase concludes with a Token Generation Event (TGE) launched via decentralized platforms.

roadmap.heading: Launch of AI Agent Marketplace
roadmap.desc: This Phase introduces the GenOS AI AI Marketplace, where users can trade and purchase pre-designed Token or Ai Agent. The AMrketplace features various AI agent categories, including social media bots and virtual assistants, with ongoing feedback collection to enchance its functionality.

roadmap.heading: Alpha Testing and Platform Foundation
roadmap.desc: Launch alpha version with AI agent costumization and Telegram/Twitter integration. Gather community feedback to refine usability..

roadmap.heading: Beta Platform Realese
roadmap.desc: Launch the beta version of GenOS AI with Telegram, Twitter(X), and app integration. Introduce staking for $GENOS to offer passive income and expand token use for deploying and managing GenOS AI.

roadmap.heading: AI Agent Costumization adn Advanced Functionalities
roadmap.desc: Enable advanced costumization for personalized GenOS AI, add new types like content asssistant and meme genrators, and expand integrations with third-party APIs.

roadmap.heading: Community Growth and Incentives
roadmap.desc: Introduce rewards, governence for $GENOS holders, and partnerships with crypto/AI communities to boost adoption.

roadmap.heading: Cross-Chain Integration and Scalability
roadmap.desc: Expand $GENOS to multi-chain networks like BSC and Polygon, implement Layer-2 solutions for faster transaction,and ensure blockchain interoperability for better user access.

roadmap.heading: Full Decentralization and Future Innovations
roadmap.desc: Implement a DAO for governence by $GENOS holders, enchance GenOS AI with adaptive learning and predictive analytics,expand language support, and drive continuous innovation for a sustainable platform.
